trans-unit.source: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

trans-unit.resname: M10·165 | Acidic Slime | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标神器，结界或地。

trans-unit.resname: M10·167 | Awakener Druid | Card Name
M10·167 | Awakener Druid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target Forest becomes a 4/5 green Treefolk creature for as long as CARDNAME remains on the battlefield. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，只要CARDNAME仍在战场，目标树林便成为4/5绿色的树妖生物。 它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: M10·169 | Borderland Ranger | Card Name
M10·169 | Borderland Ranger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，展示该牌，并将它置入你手上。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: M10·170 | Bountiful Harvest | Card Name
M10·170 | Bountiful Harvest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 1 life for each land you control.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个地，便获得1点生命。

M10·171 | Bramble Creeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: M10·190 | Lurking Predators | Card Name
M10·190 | Lurking Predators | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, you may put that card on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手施放咒语时，展示你的牌库顶牌。若该牌是生物牌，则将之放进战场。若否，则你可以将该牌置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: M10·191 | Master of the Wild Hunt | Card Name
M10·191 | Master of the Wild Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，派出一个2/2绿色的狼衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: M10·191 | Master of the Wild Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.
trans-unit.target: {T}：横置所有由你操控且未横置的狼生物。每个以此法横置的狼各对目标生物造成等同于前者力量的伤害。该生物对这些狼中的任意数量造成总共等同于该生物力量的伤害，其操控者可以任意分配。
